main event: A U.S. Army sergeant observed an unidentified flying object near Camp Ledo, Burma on July 8, 1966.
interesting points: The object was first sighted at an elevation of approximately 45 degrees and appeared to be stationary.
After about 3 minutes, the object began moving in a northeasterly direction at a very rapid rate of speed.
The object emitted a constant bright white light, but no other lights or sounds were observed.
The object was observed for a total of approximately 5 minutes before it disappeared from view.
The sergeant estimated the size of the object to be approximately 20 to 30 feet in diameter and the altitude to be between 5,000 and 10,000 feet.
sighted object: a bright white light that moved rapidly
